attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The country deserves to be heard in this current and most unusual situation.  Borrowing incredible levels without asking those of us who will have to pay it back is simply not good enough.  We deserve to be heard and to be able to vote on who we want to take us through this crisis.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
